Articles.Content:
Greetings.

I think i\'ve just hit the max height for the game. There is no longer any movement on my screen and the counter doesn\'t go up any further either. I dare you to try go higher. (speeding up time is recommendatory unless you want to post 7 years later)

It\'s more or less unbounded once you hit Kerbol escape. If you go fast enough, the altitude widget will continue past gigameters to tera, peta, exa, zetta, and finally yotta. If you get it to rollover again, the counter resets.

edit: 1000 YM being ~106 billion light years. You\'re unlikely to need more distance than that. =P
2229 and counting. 1344 hours(i think it is?) and counting. Won\'t be leaving my pc on all night but i\'d love to see it reset. If i close the game will it save where the ship is?
If you have the latest version, yes, but the demo will not save it.
ah, right. Thank you. Yes I have full version. Is it normal that I can\'t see my ship anymore? it\'s like it\'s floated off without me
